guides.name: Saguaro
guides.biography:
Saguaro grew up rafting and now has over 8 years of experience guiding and trip leading for MRO. 
	Ryan is an elementary school teacher in the off-season and a proud father. His knowledge about the river and 
	its history leaves every guest with a deep appreciation for whichever canyon they are rafting through.

guides.name: Gleaming
guides.biography:
Gleaming has been guiding for 6 years. Her an unmatched love for Idaho’s rivers, history, and beauty 
	gives guests a unique perspective on how special the Idaho Wilderness is. She’s an Idaho native, raised on the Salmon River, 
	and is a graduate of Natural Resources Management from the University of Idaho. She spends most of his free time with her husband, camera, dog, and drift boat.

guides.name: Everest
guides.biography:
Everest has 16 years experience guiding and is a great fly fisherman and an incredible storyteller. 
	After working for a few years in Natural Resources, he now spends most of his time climbing, fishing, rafting, 
	and working as a ski instructor at Snowbird in the winter.
